title: Delicate Diamond Mangalsutra Necklace - నల్లపూసల దండ
features: A modern take on the traditional Mangalsutra. Features a dainty rose gold chain interspersed with delicate black onyx beads. The necklace is adorned with sparkling CZ diamond floral pendants, providing a touch of contemporary elegance. The rose gold offers a modern contrast to the traditional black beads.
occasions: Valentine's Day. A perfect blend of tradition and modern aesthetics for everyday wear and special occasions.
description: This Mangalsutra is a beautiful fusion of tradition and contemporary style. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable daily wear while the high-quality CZ diamonds offer a luxurious sparkle. It's a subtle yet meaningful expression of commitment and love, handcrafted with precision and care.
